item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

Ok today i am going to start my first 508 server, and i know nothing about it lol so i have a question

how would i make like ::barrows ??
i kinda thing you would add something like this is “commands.java”

if (cmd[0].equals(“barrows”) {
additem(1234, 1);
}
(then the rest of barrows)

dont even call me a tard or anything please ive never coded a 508 i got the cmd[0] fom other commands

Read full topic
